Package Common

Interface MarketplaceDataSource

All Known Implementing Classes:
JDBCMarketplaceDataSource, MarketplaceDataTest, NetworkDataSource
public interface MarketplaceDataSource
Provides functionality needed by any data source for the Marketplace.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addAsset​(Asset a)
    Adds an asset to the marketplace, if they are not already in it.
    void addOldOrder​(Order order)
    Adds an old order to the history in the marketplace.
    void addOrder​(Order order)
    Adds an order to the marketplace.
    void addOrg​(Org org)
    Adds an organisation to the marketplace, if they are not already in it.
    void addOrgAsset​(OrgAsset a)
    Adds an asset to an organisation to the marketplace, if they do not already own it.
    void addUser​(User u)
    Adds a user to the marketplace, if they are not already in it.
    java.util.Set<java.lang.String> allOldOrderSet()
    Retrieves a set of all old orders from the data source.
    java.util.Set<java.lang.String> allOrderSet()
    Retrieves a set of all orders from the data source.
    java.util.Set<java.lang.String> assetSet()
    Retrieves a set of assets from the data source that are used in the assets list.
    boolean checkOrgAsset​(java.lang.String asset)
    Checks if any organisations in the marketplace own a particular asset.
    void close()
    Finalizes any resources used by the data source and ensures data is persisted.
    void deleteAsset​(java.lang.String asset)
    Deletes an asset from the marketplace.
    void deleteOrg​(java.lang.String org)
    Deletes an organisations from the marketplace.
    void deleteOrgAsset​(java.lang.String org, java.lang.String asset)
    Deletes an organisations asset from the marketplace.
    void deleterOrder​(java.lang.String orderID)
    Deletes an order from the marketplace.
    void deleteUser​(java.lang.String user)
    Deletes a user from the marketplace
    Asset getAsset​(java.lang.String asset)
    Extracts all the details of an asset from the marketplace based on the name passed in.
    int getAssetSize()
    Gets the number of assets in the marketplace.
    int getCurrentOrgAssetSize​(java.lang.String org)
    Gets the number of asset types organisations own in the marketplace.
    Order getOldOrder​(java.lang.String orderID)
    Extracts all the details of an old order from the marketplace based on the orderID passed in.
    Order getOrder​(java.lang.String orderID)
    Extracts all the details of an order from the marketplace based on the orderID passed in.
    int getOrderSize​(java.lang.String orderType)
    Gets the number of orders in the marketplace.
    Org getOrg​(java.lang.String org)
    Extracts all the details of an organisation from the marketplace based on the name passed in.
    OrgAsset getOrgAsset​(java.lang.String org, java.lang.String asset)
    Extracts all the details for an organisation's asset from the marketplace based on the organisation and asset passed in.
    int getOrgAssetSize()
    Gets the number of asset types organisations own in the marketplace.
    int getOrgSize()
    Gets the number of organisations in the marketplace.
    User getUser​(java.lang.String user)
    Extracts all the details of a User from the marketplace based on the name passed in.
    int getUsersSize()
    Gets the number of users in the marketplace.
    java.util.Set<java.lang.String> oldOrderSet​(java.lang.String asset)
    Retrieves a set of old orders from the data source that are used in an list for orders of an asset.
    java.util.Set<java.lang.String> orderAssetSet​(java.lang.String asset, java.lang.String orderType)
    Retrieves a set of orders from the data source that are used in an list for orders of an asset.
    java.util.Set<java.lang.String> orderSet​(java.lang.String orderType)
    Retrieves a set of orders from the data source that are used in an orders list for order types of an asset.
    java.util.Set<java.lang.String> orgAssetSet()
    Retrieves a set of organisations-asset from the data source that are used in the organisations-asset list.
    java.util.Set<java.lang.String> orgSet()
    Retrieves a set of organisations from the data source that are used in the organisation list.
    void updateAssetQuantity​(java.lang.String qty, java.lang.String org, java.lang.String asset)
    Updates an organisations asset quantity in the marketplace.
    void updateCredits​(java.lang.String org, java.lang.String credits)
    Updates an organisations credits in the marketplace.
    void updateOrder​(java.lang.String assetQty, java.lang.String orderID)
    Updates an order in the marketplace with the remaining asset quantity to buy/sell.
    void updateUser​(java.lang.String newUser, java.lang.String pwd, java.lang.String accType, java.lang.String org, java.lang.String oldUser)
    Updates an organisations asset quantity in the marketplace.
    java.util.Set<java.lang.String> userSet()
    Retrieves a set of users from the data source that are used in the user list.

  • Method Details

    • addUser

      void addUser​(User u)
      Adds a user to the marketplace, if they are not already in it.
      Parameters:
      u - User to add

    • getUser

      User getUser​(java.lang.String user)
      Extracts all the details of a User from the marketplace based on the name passed in.
      Parameters:
      user - The user as a String to search for.
      Returns:
      all details in a User object for the name.

    • getUsersSize

      int getUsersSize()
      Gets the number of users in the marketplace.
      Returns:
      number of marketplace users.

    • deleteUser

      void deleteUser​(java.lang.String user)
      Deletes a user from the marketplace
      Parameters:
      user - The user to be deleted.

    • updateUser

      void updateUser​(java.lang.String newUser, java.lang.String pwd, java.lang.String accType, java.lang.String org, java.lang.String oldUser)
      Updates an organisations asset quantity in the marketplace.
      Parameters:
      newUser - The username to update.
      pwd - The password to update for the user.
      accType - The account type to update for the user.
      org - The organisation to update for the user.
      oldUser - The user to update details for.

    • userSet

      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> userSet()
      Retrieves a set of users from the data source that are used in the user list.
      Returns:
      set of users.

    • addOrg

      void addOrg​(Org org)
      Adds an organisation to the marketplace, if they are not already in it.
      Parameters:
      org - organisation to add.

    • getOrg

      Org getOrg​(java.lang.String org)
      Extracts all the details of an organisation from the marketplace based on the name passed in.
      Parameters:
      org - The organisation as a String to search for.
      Returns:
      all details in an organisations object for the name.

    • getOrgSize

      int getOrgSize()
      Gets the number of organisations in the marketplace.
      Returns:
      number of marketplace organisations.

    • deleteOrg

      void deleteOrg​(java.lang.String org)
      Deletes an organisations from the marketplace.
      Parameters:
      org - The organisation to be deleted.

    • updateCredits

      void updateCredits​(java.lang.String org, java.lang.String credits)
      Updates an organisations credits in the marketplace.
      Parameters:
      org - The organisation getting updated.
      credits - The amount of credits to update

    • orgSet

      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> orgSet()
      Retrieves a set of organisations from the data source that are used in the organisation list.
      Returns:
      set of organisations.

      void addAsset​(Asset a)
      Adds an asset to the marketplace, if they are not already in it.
      Parameters:
      a - organisation to add.

      Returns:

    • addOrgAsset

      void addOrgAsset​(OrgAsset a)
      Adds an asset to an organisation to the marketplace, if they do not already own it.
      Parameters:
      a - organisation asset to add.

    • getOrgAssetSize

      int getOrgAssetSize()
      Gets the number of asset types organisations own in the marketplace.
      Returns:
      number of asset types owned by organisations.

    • getCurrentOrgAssetSize

      int getCurrentOrgAssetSize​(java.lang.String org)
      Gets the number of asset types organisations own in the marketplace.
      Parameters:
      org - The organisation as a String to search for.
      Returns:
      number of asset types owned by organisations.

    • getOrgAsset

      OrgAsset getOrgAsset​(java.lang.String org, java.lang.String asset)
      Extracts all the details for an organisation's asset from the marketplace based on the organisation and asset passed in.
      Parameters:
      org - The organisation as a String to search for.
      asset - The asset as a String to search for.
      Returns:
      all details for an organisation's asset object.

    • checkOrgAsset

      boolean checkOrgAsset​(java.lang.String asset)
      Checks if any organisations in the marketplace own a particular asset.
      Parameters:
      asset - the asset to be checked.
      Returns:
      true or false if an organisation owns the asset.

    • deleteOrgAsset

      void deleteOrgAsset​(java.lang.String org, java.lang.String asset)
      Deletes an organisations asset from the marketplace.
      Parameters:
      org - the organisation for the asset to be deleted.
      asset - the asset to be deleted.

    • updateAssetQuantity

      void updateAssetQuantity​(java.lang.String qty, java.lang.String org, java.lang.String asset)
      Updates an organisations asset quantity in the marketplace.
      Parameters:
      qty - The quantity of the asset to update.
      org - The organisation to update asset quantity for.
      asset - The asset to update quantity of.

    • orgAssetSet

      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> orgAssetSet()
      Retrieves a set of organisations-asset from the data source that are used in the organisations-asset list.
      Returns:
      set of organisations-asset.

    • addOrder

      void addOrder​(Order order)
      Adds an order to the marketplace.
      Parameters:
      order - order to add.

    • getOrder

      Order getOrder​(java.lang.String orderID)
      Extracts all the details of an order from the marketplace based on the orderID passed in.
      Parameters:
      orderID - The orderID to search for.
      Returns:
      all details in an organisations object for the name.

    • getOrderSize

      int getOrderSize​(java.lang.String orderType)
      Gets the number of orders in the marketplace.
      Parameters:
      orderType - the order type BUY or SELL
      Returns:
      number of marketplace orders.

    • deleterOrder

      void deleterOrder​(java.lang.String orderID)
      Deletes an order from the marketplace.
      Parameters:
      orderID - The order to be deleted.

    • updateOrder

      void updateOrder​(java.lang.String assetQty, java.lang.String orderID)
      Updates an order in the marketplace with the remaining asset quantity to buy/sell.
      Parameters:
      assetQty - The remaining asset quantity.
      orderID - The orderID to update

    • orderSet

      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> orderSet​(java.lang.String orderType)
      Retrieves a set of orders from the data source that are used in an orders list for order types of an asset.
      Parameters:
      orderType - the type of order (BUY/SELL)
      Returns:
      set of orders of particular type.

    • orderAssetSet

      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> orderAssetSet​(java.lang.String asset, java.lang.String orderType)
      Retrieves a set of orders from the data source that are used in an list for orders of an asset.
      Parameters:
      asset - the asset to retrieve orders for
      orderType - the type of order (BUY/SELL)
      Returns:
      set of orders of a given type for a given asset.

    • allOrderSet

      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> allOrderSet()
      Retrieves a set of all orders from the data source.
      Returns:
      set of all orders.

    • addOldOrder

      void addOldOrder​(Order order)
      Adds an old order to the history in the marketplace.
      Parameters:
      order - order to add.

    • getOldOrder

      Order getOldOrder​(java.lang.String orderID)
      Extracts all the details of an old order from the marketplace based on the orderID passed in.
      Parameters:
      orderID - The orderID to search for.
      Returns:
      all details in an organisations object for the name.

    • oldOrderSet

      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> oldOrderSet​(java.lang.String asset)
      Retrieves a set of old orders from the data source that are used in an list for orders of an asset.
      Parameters:
      asset - the asset to retrieve orders for
      Returns:
      set of orders of a given type for a given asset.

    • allOldOrderSet

      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> allOldOrderSet()
      Retrieves a set of all old orders from the data source.
      Returns:
      set of all old orders.

    • close

      void close()
      Finalizes any resources used by the data source and ensures data is persisted.
